mdRecord.dcterms:description: Various diary entries with time, date, weather; other comments, including some regarding Christianity, with responses, including a doodle of the flying spaghetti monster (labeled "FSM"). [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
